description: Get metadata attributes for an image set.

nested_items.name: imageSetMetadataBlob
nested_items.description: The blob containing the aggregated metadata information for the image set.

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The format in which the study metadata is returned to the customer. Default is text/plain.

nested_items.name: contentEncoding
nested_items.description: The compression format in which image set metadata attributes are returned.
